trans-unit.source: Specifies the appearance of the border for a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref> on a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Specifica l'aspetto del bordo per un <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"> </xref> su un <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"> </xref> controllo.

trans-unit.source: This enumeration is used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.BorderStyle%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> class.
trans-unit.target: Questa enumerazione viene utilizzata la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.BorderStyle%2A>proprietà di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>classe.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.BorderStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.BorderStyle%2A> property enables you to specify the style of border to display on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> within a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>.
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.BorderStyle%2A>proprietà consente di specificare lo stile del bordo da visualizzare su un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>all'interno di un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.BorderStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref> is displayed with a three-dimensional raised border.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"> </xref> viene visualizzato con un bordo tridimensionale in rilievo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref> is displayed with a three-dimensional sunken border.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"> </xref> viene visualizzato con un bordo incassato tridimensionale.
